feature.label: ECF OSGi Remote Services Admin
feature.description:
This feature provides the ECF Implementation of OSGi R6 Remote Services and Remote Service Admin. Remote Services are specified in chapter 100 of the OSGi R6 Enterprise specification while RSA is specified in chapter 122 of the OSGi R6 Enterprise specification.
For specifications see
http://www.osgi.org/Specifications/HomePage
For tutorials, documentation, and examples with ECF's Implementation of OSGi RS/RSA see
https://wiki.eclipse.org/ECF#OSGi_Remote_Services
